0x16F.AA

15*16^0+6*16^1+1*16^2=15+96+256=367

10*16^-1+10*16^-2=0.625+0.0390625=0.6640625

0x16F.AA = 367.6640625

0x19.CA

9*16^0+1*16^1=9+16=25

12*16^-1+10*16^-2=0.75+0.0390625=0.7890625

0x19.CA = 25.7890625

0x4A.CD

10*16^0+4*16^1 = 10+64=74

12*16^-1+13*16^-2=0.75+0.05078125 = 0.80078125

0x4A.CD = 74.80078125

0x7F.08

15*16^0+7*16^1=15+112=127

0*16^-1+8*16^-2=0.03125

0x7F.08 = 127.03125
